loans_data.id: A row identifyer for the loans table. Each id is unique for each row.
loans_data.loan_amnt: The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower.
loans_data.funded_amnt: The total amount committed to the loan by the Lending Club.
loans_data.funded_amnt_inv: The total amount committed by investors for the loan.
loans_data.installment: The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan originates.
loans_data.emp_title: The job title supplied by the borrower when applying for the loan.
loans_data.home_ownership: The home ownership status provided by the borrower during registration. Values are: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER.
loans_data.annual_inc: The self-reported annual income provided by the borrower during registration.
loans_data.verification_status: Indicates if income was verified by Lending Club.
loans_data.pymnt_plan: Indicates if a payment plan has been put in place for the loan.
loans_data.url: URL for the Lending Club page with detailed information about the loan.
loans_data.desc: Loan description provided by the borrower.
loans_data.purpose: A category provided by the borrower for the loan request.
loans_data.title: The loan title provided by the borrower.
loans_data.zip_code: The first 3 numbers of the zip code provided by the borrower in the loan application.
loans_data.addr_state: The state provided by the borrower in the loan application.
loans_data.dti: Debt-to-income ratio calculated using the borrower’s total monthly debt payments divided by their self-reported monthly income.
loans_data.delinq_2yrs: The number of 30+ days delinquencies the borrower has had in the past 2 years.
loans_data.earliest_cr_line: The month and year the borrower’s earliest reported credit line was opened.
loans_data.fico_range_low: The lower boundary range of the borrower’s FICO score at the time of loan origination.
loans_data.fico_range_high: The upper boundary range of the borrower’s FICO score at the time of loan origination.
loans_data.inq_last_6mths: The number of credit inquiries the borrower has had in the last 6 months (excluding auto and mortgage inquiries).
loans_data.mths_since_last_delinq: The number of months since the borrower’s last delinquency.
loans_data.mths_since_last_record: The number of months since the last public record.
loans_data.open_acc: The number of open credit lines in the borrower’s credit file.
loans_data.pub_rec: Number of derogatory public records, such as bankruptcy filings, tax liens, or judgments.
loans_data.revol_bal: The total amount of credit revolving balances.
loans_data.revol_util: Revolving line utilization rate, or the amount of credit the borrower is using relative to all available revolving credit.
loans_data.total_acc: The total number of credit lines currently in the borrower’s credit file.
loans_data.initial_list_status: The initial listing status of the loan. Possible values are – W, F.
loans_data.out_prncp: The remaining outstanding principal for total amount funded.
loans_data.out_prncp_inv: The remaining outstanding principal for portion of total amount funded by investors.
loans_data.total_pymnt: Payments received to date for total amount funded.
loans_data.total_pymnt_inv: Payments received to date for portion of total amount funded by investors.
loans_data.last_fico_range_high: The upper boundary range of the borrower’s last FICO score.
loans_data.last_fico_range_low: The lower boundary range of the borrower’s last FICO score.
loans_data.collections_12_mths_ex_med: Number of collections in 12 months excluding medical collections.
loans_data.mths_since_last_major_derog: Months since most recent 90-day or worse rating.
loans_data.policy_code: Publicly available policy_code=1, new products not publicly available policy_code=2.
loans_data.application_type: Indicates whether the loan is an individual application or a joint application with two co-borrowers.
loans_data.annual_inc_joint: The combined annual income reported by the co-borrowers on a joint application.
loans_data.dti_joint: The debt-to-income ratio calculated using the total monthly debt payments of the co-borrowers, divided by the combined self-reported monthly income of the co-borrowers, on a joint application.
loans_data.verification_status_joint: Indicates if the co-borrowers’ joint income was verified by Lending Club.
loans_data.acc_now_delinq: The number of accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent.
loans_data.tot_cur_bal: Total current balance of all accounts.
loans_data.open_acc_6m: Number of open trades in the last 6 months.
loans_data.open_act_il: Number of currently active installment trades.
loans_data.open_il_12m: Number of installment accounts opened in past 12 months.
loans_data.open_il_24m: Number of installment accounts opened in past 24 months.
loans_data.mths_since_rcnt_il: Months since the most recent installment account opened.
loans_data.total_bal_il: Total current balance of all installment accounts.
loans_data.il_util: Ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit on all installment accounts.
loans_data.open_rv_12m: Number of revolving trades opened in past 12 months.
loans_data.open_rv_24m: Number of revolving trades opened in past 24 months.
loans_data.max_bal_bc: Maximum current balance owed on all revolving accounts.
loans_data.all_util: Balance to credit limit on all trades.
loans_data.inq_last_12m: Number of credit inquiries in the past 12 months.
loans_data.acc_open_past_24mths: Number of accounts opened in past 24 months.
loans_data.avg_cur_bal: Average current balance of all accounts.
loans_data.bc_open_to_buy: Total open to buy on revolving bankcards.
loans_data.bc_util: Ratio of total current balance to high credit/credit limit for all bankcard accounts.
loans_data.chargeoff_within_12_mths: Number of charge-offs within  last 12 months.
loans_data.delinq_amnt: The past-due amount owed for the accounts on which the borrower is now delinquent.
loans_data.mo_sin_old_il_acct: Months since oldest bank installment account opened.
loans_data.mo_sin_old_rev_tl_op: Months since oldest revolving account opened.
loans_data.mo_sin_rcnt_rev_tl_op: Months since most recent revolving account opened.
loans_data.mo_sin_rcnt_tl: Months since most recent account opened.
loans_data.mths_since_recent_bc: Months since most recent bankcard account opened.
loans_data.mths_since_recent_bc_dlq: Months since most recent bankcard delinquency.
loans_data.mths_since_recent_revol_delinq: Months since most recent revolving delinquency.
loans_data.num_accts_ever_120_pd: Number of accounts ever 120 or more days past due.
loans_data.num_actv_bc_tl: Number of currently active bankcard accounts.
loans_data.num_actv_rev_tl: Number of currently active revolving trades.
loans_data.num_bc_tl: Number of bankcard accounts (credit cards issued by banks).
loans_data.num_il_tl: Number of installment loan accounts (loans with fixed payments and a set maturity date).
loans_data.num_op_rev_tl: Number of open revolving accounts (credit cards and lines of credit).
loans_data.num_rev_tl_bal_gt_0: Number of revolving trades with balance greater than zero.
loans_data.num_tl_120dpd_2m: Number of accounts currently 120 days past due (updated in past 2 months).
loans_data.num_tl_30dpd: Number of accounts currently 30 days past due.
loans_data.num_tl_90g_dpd_24m: Number of accounts 90 or more days past due in last 24 months.
loans_data.num_tl_op_past_12m: Number of accounts opened in past 12 months.
loans_data.percent_bc_gt_75: Percentage of bankcard accounts with credit utilization greater than 75%.
loans_data.tot_hi_cred_lim: Total high credit/credit limit (the total of the maximum amount of credit extended on all accounts).
loans_data.revol_bal_joint: Total revolving balance on joint accounts.
loans_data.sec_app_fico_range_low: FICO range (low) for the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_fico_range_high: FICO range (high) for the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_inq_last_6mths: Number of credit inquiries for the secondary applicant in the last 6 months.
loans_data.sec_app_mort_acc: Number of mortgage accounts held by the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_open_acc: Number of open credit lines in the secondary applicant’s credit file.
loans_data.sec_app_revol_util: Revolving line utilization rate, or the amount of credit the secondary applicant is using relative to all available revolving credit.
loans_data.sec_app_open_act_il: Number of currently active installment trades for the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_num_rev_accts: Number of revolving accounts held by the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_chargeoff_within_12_mths: Number of charge-offs within the last 12 months for the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_collections_12_mths_ex_med: Number of collections in 12 months excluding medical collections for the secondary applicant.
loans_data.sec_app_mths_since_last_major_derog: Months since the secondary applicant’s last major derogatory event.
loans_data.hardship_flag: Flags whether the borrower is on a hardship plan.
loans_data.hardship_type: Type of hardship plan offered to the borrower, if any.
loans_data.hardship_reason: Reason provided by the borrower for the hardship event.
loans_data.hardship_status: Current status of the hardship plan.
loans_data.deferral_term: The number of months that the borrower is expected to pay less than the contractual monthly payment amount due to a hardship plan.
loans_data.hardship_amount: The amount of the monthly payment that the borrower must pay while under a hardship plan.
loans_data.hardship_length: The length of the hardship plan in months.
loans_data.hardship_dpd: Number of days past due as of the hardship plan start date.
loans_data.hardship_loan_status: Loan status as of the hardship plan start date.
loans_data.orig_projected_additional_accrued_intere: The original estimated total amount of additional interest the borrower will pay as a result of the hardship plan.
loans_data.hardship_payoff_balance_amount: The balance amount at the time the borrower entered into a hardship plan.
loans_data.hardship_last_payment_amount: The last payment amount made by the borrower before entering the hardship plan.
loans_data.disbursement_method: Method by which the borrower receives their loan. Possible values are "cash", "directpay", etc.
loans_data.debt_settlement_flag: Indicates whether the borrower, who has charged-off, is working with a debt settlement company.
loans_data.settlement_status: The status of the borrower’s settlement plan. Possible values are "active", "completed", "broken", etc.
loans_data.settlement_amount: The amount that the borrower has agreed to pay in a settlement plan.
loans_data.settlement_percentage: The percentage of the unpaid principal balance the borrower has agreed to pay in a settlement plan.
loans_data.settlement_term: The number of months the borrower will be on the settlement plan.
loans_data.issue_d_unix: The date when the loan was funded, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.last_pymnt_d_unix: The date of the last payment received, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.next_pymnt_d_unix: The date of the next scheduled payment, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.last_credit_pull_d_unix: The most recent date Lending Club pulled credit for this loan, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.sec_app_earliest_cr_line_unix: Earliest credit line date for the secondary applicant, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.hardship_start_date_unix: The start date of the hardship plan, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.hardship_end_date_unix: The end date of the hardship plan, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.payment_plan_start_date_unix: The start date of the payment plan, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.settlement_date_unix: The date that the borrower agrees to the settlement plan, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.debt_settlement_flag_date_unix: The date that the borrower"s debt settlement flag was set, converted to Unix time.
loans_data.term_months: The length of the loan term in months.
loans_data.emp_length_years: The borrower’s length of employment in years.
loans_data.loan_id: Identification nunber of the loan according to the url associated

metadata.Total amount funded in policy code 1: Contains the total amount, in dollars, funded in loans with policy code 1.
metadata.Total amount funded in policy code 2: Contains the total amount, in dollars, funded in loans with policy code 2.

descriptions.name: The name of the element to be described
descriptions.full_name: The full name of the column, as it would appear on plots
descriptions.type: The type of the element, table or column
descriptions.location: The table where the element is located (root if it's a table)
descriptions.data_type: The type of the data that column contails, (INT, REAL, TEXT, TABLE)
